original_text: Do this with both men and women. Send them out of the camp. They must not make the camp unclean, because that is where I live among the people.’
korean_text: 남녀를 막론하고 다 진영 밖으로 내보내어 그들이 진영을 더럽히게 하지 말라 내가 그 진영 가운데에 거하느니라 하시매

sentences.original_text: Do this with both men and women.
Send them out of the camp.
They must not make the camp unclean,
because that is where I live
